website_summaries.verdict: Though it lacks a few convenient features, it's a  quality panini press that heats quickly and turns out delicious hot sandwiches, pancakes, and more.
pros: Four height settings mean you can grill even the fattest sandwiches
cons: Plates are not removable for cleaning

website_summaries.verdict: Its quality features and ability to make a variety of sandwiches of all sizes compensate for its few inconveniences. The top choice for your money.
pros: A sturdy, versatile model that heats, toasts, melts, and cooks quickly
Ribbed top plate makes grill marks
cons: Grill plates aren't removable, but their nonstick surfaces make them easier to clean than similar models
Some owners wish it had an on/off switch

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Best breville buy
customer_reviews.text: So finally I bought Breville Panini maker after due consideration and comparing with various other products. It serves the purpose and is very useful for a family of 4. In one go I can make 4 sandwiches/ open toasties. However after few uses I realize that the base gets heated up after using it twice and the bread starts getting burnt. So you need to let the machine cool down a bit before you can use it again. which i guess is not so bad. No smoke, no smell and easy to use. I like it and can't wait to experiment more.
customer_reviews.author: Suruchi

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: Great little device: warms up quickly and prepares paninis in no time. It's powerful enough to make panini out of frozen bread w/o thawing. The fact that the cooking plates are not removable is not a problem at all. It's very easy to clean them with a wet napkin or a sponge. Love it. Takes little space and can be conveniently stored in a kitchen cabinet. I own a coffee maker from Breville and they again didn't disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Ivo Dimitrov

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful in cooking anything; works great!
customer_reviews.text: My family is all gluten free. We have always tried to make paninis but we always come out with a subpar version of the real meal. This press toasts bread easily. We use it to make burritos, sandwiches, hash browns, eggs, and fried potatoes. It is almost always on the counter all day because we use it so much. I strongly recommend this for families and kitchens. It is a wonderful appliance to have in the kitchen and I am glad that we found it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breville panini maker is worth it for the long haul.
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted to panini now thanks to this amazing appliance. When first using, I plugged it in and follow the instruction as if making a panini but did not put any food in the machine to allow the initial factory smell to go away after about 10 min without closing it then turned it off, let it cooled off then wiped it clean with damp soapy cloth, dried it and it was ready to be used without any lingering initial odor. They provide also a booklet with lots of recipes. I have the Breville smart oven for a year and half and I know this will be durable also.
customer_reviews.author: Tulippenoire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pressed sandwiches every time!
customer_reviews.text: Got this press because son took my larger Breville press to college. Needed one for his visits so he can feed himself! Purchased from Amazon warehouse so the price was appealing. Perfect size for one large or two smaller sandwiches. Heats quickly and cooks evenly. Clean up is a breeze. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie A.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for grilled sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this panini press after checking out the reviews for various models. The only negative thing I can say about it is that it doesn't have an on-off switch. I guess I missed that. Otherwise, it doesn't take long to heat up, sandwiches are nicely browned without using oil or butter, and the contents are hot. Thicker breads or rolls take some extra time and had to be moved a few times. The top really isn't heavy enough to flatten them out. It's easy to clean even with melted cheese.
customer_reviews.author: September MorneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: We really like this Panini Press and end up using quite a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am always dubious about the worth of "Kitchen Gadgets". They usually aren't that helpful and eventually end up forgotten on a shelf in the garage or donated to a Thrift Store. We really like this Panini Press and end up using quite a lot. I would say it's replaced our toaster about 30% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Val Richard

customer_reviews.title: holiday surprise
customer_reviews.text: It's a Black Friday's surprise. The outbox package is in good condition. But the machine's package has a little dent. When I opened the box, it's a big surprise. The shaft was broken. I even saw the metal has a crack. The amazon custom servicer asks me to contact the Breville and wait for them. But I don't like to wait in this holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Rui Ru Lei

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from Another Product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a panini press where the drop down top part stayed level on the sandwich, and this item met that requirement perfectly. The bottom plate is smooth offering the ability to cook eggs, pancakes and other foods while the top plate still gives the panini wrinkle pattern. I am completely satisfied with this model that has met all my needs. It is ridiculously easy to clean and store, although I keep it on a cutting board to absorb the heat on one of my kitchen countertops. This model may be a bit expensive, but the features more than compensate for that. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for panini’s. Don’t buy if you’re going to cook meats or poultry. Not set up with drainage for that
customer_reviews.author: M. Coffey

customer_reviews.title: My new lunch bestie!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best. Bought it for my bf as a birthday gift, but I have been using it for lunch and it's unlocked my world from boring sandwiches to instant gourmet chef. It heats up super fast, is super easy to use and takes up very little room to store since it can be stored upright, and I can throw whatever I have on hand between a couple of slices of bread and bam! Instant fancy hot sandwich. Game changer. Doesn't take much longer than to slap together a PB&J, but a huge lunch-quality-of-life improvement. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi C.

customer_reviews.title: The Summer of Panini
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Lightly buttered bread (or not) and whatever inside with some kind of cheese, and a few minutes later a crispy, perfectly golden sandwich comes out! Grilled cheese's Bestie. Wish we got one 5 years ago!
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made a great sandwich pretty fast. After several uses the non stick surface came off. Returned it refund
customer_reviews.author: M. Nemec

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I researched panini makers and this was the top rated on many sites. After getting it and using it I have fallen in love with it! Prob one of my most used items now in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Kodee Wignall

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes yes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a cheaper brand before this one and it was too small and too light so I returned it and forked over a couple more bucks. Worth it. This is sturdy and versatile, perfect paninis in just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sadan

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get as hot as my old panini grill ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get as hot as my old panini grill. Grilled Cheese sandwiches are kind of soggy, although browned well enough. It seems to steam the sandwich more than grill it.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: This grill is so versatile and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The eas of operation is what I like best with this when making panini sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Quick heating. Even toasting. Perfect lid. Solid build.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Build quality is excellent as you would expect from a Breville. It heats quickly, heats evenly and the hinged lid works perfectly. It can be easily stored upright which is a nice bonus. It heats and toasts sandwiches evenly and perfectly. Cons: There is no switch which means you have to plug it in and out each time to use it. The hearing plates can't be removed so they must be cleaned in place.
customer_reviews.author: Leights

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Though it seems like a quality grill, the cleaning features were not as expected. When I ordered it I saw reviews talking about the removable grill plates that were dishwasher safe. The BSG520XL does NOT have removable grill plates. I'm not sure if it was my error in sorting Amazon reviews to the model being considered (another huge pain), or outright deception. Amazon should ALWAYS display reviews ONLY for the model being considered! I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Next day Pizza 🍕  is real
customer_reviews.text: It changed my day, it is saves my time. Well made, complete surface heat at the same degree. I like that has flat surface on one side and other is grilled for better cook. I used for my amazing sandwiches and reheating the Pizza, next day Pizza it taste like fresh one. I did try doing meat of beacon and see how easy to clean the grease.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulrahman

customer_reviews.title: Sold on Breville Panini Duo
customer_reviews.text: I researched all the panini grills available. Thought I wanted the culinart 3-in-1 griddler. Boiled it down to that one vs the Breville 520XL. The Breville won out. Decided that removable plates weren't as important as getting even browning. We've had panini or grilled sandwiches 3 days in a row. So easy to use, clean, heats quickly and the most gorgeous and yummy grilled sandwiches ever. I made the right decision! Stores easily as well with a locking mechanism to keep the Iid from opening as you shift it about.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible! Do not buy it!!! Had to unplugged it off the wall every time! Does not have an on/off button! It almost short circuited!!! Truly horrible!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sachenka lobato

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I buy this same panini toaster. We had to replace our 3 year old one, which we use several times a day. We use it for bagels, sourdough, wraps, burritos, etc. The Mel feature is great if you want to make homemade pizzas. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Not so big wave Dave

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! We made panini with left over Thanksgiving Good. They were perfect. I’ve also made grill cheese Sandwiches! Tonight, I grilled Salmon Shish Kabobs. They turned out great! The clean up was super quick! Just wiped it down! No mess! No splatter! Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Top quality, and a joy to cook with.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how we made it this long without one of these. I don't think we can ever go forward in life without one. The quality is outstanding! We have many Breville appliances, because we trust the quality. This heats up quickly, toasts and cooks perfectly, and cleans up so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Blue

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as big brother but nice product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a second unit after loving the bigger brother and it's great and effective but not as good. I like that the bigger one has a slopped grilling surface - makes it easier to extract finished food and clean up. This unit is good though - makes a great panini and we use it a lot... it's just not as easy to take the food off the grill or to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Great little grill! I use it a lot for paninis and have made beef and chicken, with great results. The model itself does not have temperature control, it is turned on and off by plugging/unplugging the cord. But that's already known beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: N. Storni

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Is a lot smaller than I thought it would be. Other than that it does heat and work well. Only enough room to make two at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Saville

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice grill and nothing seems to stick to the surface it was a good deal and we use the item all the time to make panni sandwiches but I also just cooked fajitas on it .... the grill does a lot .
customer_reviews.author: Playgro USA

customer_reviews.title: I love this Breville Panini press!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Breville Panini press! easy to store on your because it locks so you can set it upright. I love the different settings too. It gets very HOT and toasts very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: cooknwoman

customer_reviews.title: Best panino maker ever
customer_reviews.text: Told my husband I was getting a panini maker. Big groan. “Oh, no. Do we need another gadget?” As time went by, I began thinking that myself. Ii finally arrived. And then I tried it. I told my husband he would be the guinea pig, by being the first to try it AND the decider, by determining based on what I had made for him on this machine, if it was worth keeping Two bites and the deal was sealed. It’s absolutely staying, said he.
customer_reviews.author: porthaul

customer_reviews.title: Easy use, amazing sandwiches and burritos
customer_reviews.text: Used for about a few months now and we love it. My in laws have an older one and for some reason it’s harder to clean. This one is amazing— cooks everything quick and so easy to wipe down- even when it’s cooled! LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it can be used as a panini press or has a flat surface to cook on
customer_reviews.author: Beverly J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Used alot; not just for pressing sandwiches. Makes the very best bacon...but you can only do 2-3 strips at a time; otherwise grease will escape from unit.
customer_reviews.author: Green Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Good panini press for price!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 9 months and still use it a lot. Non-stick and easy to clean. Nice to have the different settings depending on panini size and how exactly you want it cooked
customer_reviews.author: corrine carr

customer_reviews.title: It heats the Panini all the way through and the clean up is easy. Really good investment if you are a Panini ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for our small café. We sell a lot of Panini's during the day 6 days a week and these Breville makers are still going strong. It heats the Panini all the way through and the clean up is easy. Really good investment if you are a Panini connoisseur.
customer_reviews.author: slc

customer_reviews.title: A Basically good product
customer_reviews.text: This makes good sandwiches if you like them flat. Even though the plates are adjustable height wise, it still cooks them fast (good feature), but won't leave them with any filling, it mostly squeezes over the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It is just so good to make sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: I bought this panini to replace an old one. It is just so good to make sandwiches. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: huarique

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this panini, spent hours researching panini's sized for two people and am so happy with the quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Idolgirl

customer_reviews.title: It’s wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome. I use this every single day to make breakfast sandwiches. I can’t believe I ever lived without it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Press.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Press. We've used this constantly since purchase, and it proves to be a really quality item. In terms of looks, function, and durability, it really has impressed us overall. No real specifics to complain about (especially at this price point).
customer_reviews.author: sdesign9

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great panini!
customer_reviews.text: I use it way more than I thought I would!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great countertop size
customer_reviews.text: Great countertop size. Heats evenly, crisps the bread or wrap, and adds the grill lines that I like. Using several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a Christmas gift, and he loves it! It’s easy to use and easy to clean. It’s not unattractive, so we keep it out on our countertop since it gets used almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this product <3
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this panini press. we've been using ours now for almost 5 years - and it has yet to show it's age or wear/tear. Great product that I often give as gifts. I've been buying Breville products for years, and with the exception of their terrible customer service - their products are for the most part, great! Would recommend this product to anyone :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Knight

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but not sure how much I’ll use it.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and seems to be good quality, but I expected it to be more versatile. You can’t use it to grill something like a hamburger because there is no way to collect the grease. The base plate is flat and the top plate has grooves. Probably would be fine for a chicken filet. It’s pretty small so it doesn’t take up much storage room but kinda think I could use my waffle iron and get the same results.
customer_reviews.author: #thinkoutsidethebox

customer_reviews.title: Makes a novice into a master panini maker.
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this machine, now it should be mentioned that I have only used the Breville once but it was super simple to use and the sandwich came out perfect. It doesn't have temperature control and not sure it is needed, but i reduced the score for that reason. In short, I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Sotero

customer_reviews.title: Love making sandwiches on this!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this panini press! Larger size is a bonus and it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ambldfb

customer_reviews.title: Durable simple panini press
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built appliance and perfect for paninis. it's not a multi use grill - multi use tools rarely do anything very well. This baby makes great paninis. Great quality. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. Easy to use and easy storage. One issue I have with it though is that it turns on right when you plug it in/ there is no on/off switch but once you get used to it it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Has all the features I need. Floating lid, non-stick, ease of use , easy to clean and sturdily built. Stands upright when not in use. So it doesn't take up much counter space. Can't change temperature but after months of use, that isn't I feature that I feel is needed. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Grilled cheese turned out perfect. Also did hamburger patties,pancakes and tuna melt. All were good.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Brevile products never disappoint. Works well
customer_reviews.text: Finally ordered this. Brevile products never disappoint. Works well, and yep, just use a wet paper towel to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performer
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot of reviews of various panini makers, I chose the Breville and I'm glad I did. I've had it for 2 months. It heats up fast and the flat bottom lets you cook more than paninis. I also use it to reheat pizza. The height adjuster allows you to position the top element so you can almost use it like an oven. It is small and storing it vertically doesn't take much counter space. It feels solid and cleans easily. You can't remove the heating elements but the non stick surface comes clean with a damp paper towel. BTW, it also makes great paninis.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Failed.  Not used frequently, but stopped working after a year. Before that, it was very good.
customer_reviews.text: An update. I dropped the Breville unit on the counter top, twice, and the light came back on. But, didn't head as before. I Was expecting this product to be much better. It really wasn't used verry much. But, less than one year, it stopped working. I couldn't recommend this product, and wouldn't purchase, again. Maybe I had a bad one?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, small panini press
customer_reviews.text: I got one for our office. It's nice and small, and easy to clean. Just wipe it down and it's ready to be store. Grills a sandwich in less than 5 minutes from plugging it in. Well-designed: I love the pull-hole in the plug which makes it easy to unplug if you happen to get your hands greasy/wet. Get one for your office and you'll never eat cold sandwiches again! I get a loaf of bread and various meat/cheese/vegetable on the way to work each week and BOOM! lunches are at a whole new level without going out to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: panini, grilled cheese, quesadillas. ...any kind of hot breads with cheese!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This is my first press and I love the versatility of what I can use this for! It's simple to use with minimal buttons and bells and whistles. The flat side really does heat the breads evenly and melting the cheeses while making grill marks with the top plate. Each concoction comes out perfectly grilled/toasted with the notification of the green ready light On the top cover. Only 2 negatives is that the grill pans aren't detachable so it's a bit of a chore cleaning it. Also the handle bar side edges get hot
customer_reviews.author: dot4moz

customer_reviews.title: Great panini maker
customer_reviews.text: What a great way to make a delicious sandwich or panini for lunch or light before bed snack. This is my second one Breville panini and it's better than the previous one due to the channeled piece on the top part. Makes a beautiful lines crusty marks on my sandwich
customer_reviews.author: A. castle

customer_reviews.title: What a Godsend
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing machine. I use it all the time. My husband loves paninis and so do I. It makes great bacon and eggs. This is a keeper as is my Breville Toaster Oven. They make great products that are easy to care for and easy to use. I learned of this from Oprah where she named it one of her favorite things. Also the toaster oven got a rave from Rachel Ray. So I'm a groupie. You gotta learn about products some place. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M.Gettys

customer_reviews.title: speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift, price and delivery were on point!
customer_reviews.author: bking

customer_reviews.title: Easy and works great
customer_reviews.text: quesadillas, grilled sandwiches, eggs, fried cheese, tuna melts, pancakes... I had this exact unit for over 10 years and it worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Dumas

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Really great made great easy to clean very happy use it all the time
customer_reviews.author: lynda machado

customer_reviews.title: Best panini press
customer_reviews.text: Best panini press I've ever owned! I cannot love it enough. Presses evenly and your sandwiches are crispy with awesome grill marks. Also cleaning is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: It is very durable
customer_reviews.text: I make panii’s everyday. This unit does the job. It works great, cleans easily and cooks practically everything at the correct temp. Just watch for the green light an you’re there.!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Scandariato

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and stores easily in my cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Edling

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Love this panini press/grill. It has so many uses! It’s particularly great for paninis and quesadillas . It’s sturdy and well made and very easy to clean. It was definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Breville Makes a Good Product
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I owned an older Breville Panini Maker for the past 12 years. It finally started smoking when plugged in, so it was time to throw it out. This item is similar to the older one I had, so I hope to get many years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was pricey when I purchased it but it was worth it. Cleans up very easily and quickly. We used this all summer long, at lunch time, making all types of sandwiches from whatever leftovers or cold cuts we had on hand. No more boring summer lunches for us!
customer_reviews.author: mommianna

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for making either paninis or open faced sandwiches. And it isn't too large either, which is great as we don't have lots of extra counter space. Paninis come out perfect. We are going to be using this a lot, especially with summer coming. Quick and easy for an easy dinner without heating up the whole kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JayP

customer_reviews.title: Good functionality
customer_reviews.text: This panini maker has become a staple in our kitchen. Super easy to throw together a great tasting grilled sandwich. Heats quick, and wipes up easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Breville Is The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment i have ever made. The Breville panini sandwich maker is just fantastic. I love the way i can make my sandwiches. It's definitely a great buy. I love waking up in the mornings and making my hot sandwich for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Oswaldo Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Love this panini maker!
customer_reviews.text: Makes even heated cooking possible for lots of different fun foods in the press.
customer_reviews.author: sarah T

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it!
customer_reviews.text: I made the best asparagus ever last night...followed by eggplant parmigiana If I can make that with this panini press, the paninis will be a cinch So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought it before!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Delicious sandwiches and paninis in a short time!
customer_reviews.author: Mp6017

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews for other panini makers and decided to order this one. I don't like to keep anything on my counters so after I use it I unplug it to store away. The fact that the trays are not removable has not been an issue because they easily wipe clean. This product is made well and heats up fast.
customer_reviews.author: francine13

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: This is a good functional and reasonably priced Item. I was a bit disappointed that the plates don't come off, but I got over it. I think you have to spend much more for the features that would improve it (like an on-off switch and temp controls). It works just fine, makes evenly grilled sandwiches, and is easy enough to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for quick panini toasts
customer_reviews.text: My wife has always loved Breville for it's good looks in appliance designs as well as performance, to this date we have no complaints, we gave my sister in law our original BSG520XL cause we didn't want to carry it over to our new home instead we decided to buy us a new one instead exactly the same, it's just a life saver for quick sandwiches and other meals.
customer_reviews.author: George R. Achang

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be hungry!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, I’m sorry I never got it sooner. Makes amazing panini’s!!
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Romy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect panini press
customer_reviews.text: The perfect panini press. Have been using it for about a year and still loving it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kane

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD PANINI PRESS
customer_reviews.text: WE LIKE THIS PANINI PRESS ESPECIALLY DURING THE COLD WINTERS.
customer_reviews.author: Grampy 59

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent !
customer_reviews.text: it will forever change the way you make sandwiches. it will change your life ! i got it to make cuban sandwiches like i use to get in miami but i also make quesadillas and all kinds of other delights. never burn toast or bagels again - it makes the best toast ever... i actually got rid of my toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Chris De

customer_reviews.title: Treat Yourself to a Little Taste of Italy
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this panini maker. It's so easy -- and the sandwiches are so good. It's super-simple to use and to clean. Why wouldn't you get one????
customer_reviews.author: C. Eastwood

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MACHINE! SUCH A GREAT PRICE FOR SUCH QUALITY. DONT SLEEP ON THIS ONE GET IT NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much - bought 4 more!
customer_reviews.text: We love this panini press so much that we bought four more to give as holiday gifts! So easy to use and clean. Makes every sandwich so much better. We love that you don't have to put anything on the outside of the sandwich (butter, etc.), too. The only thing I'd like to see changed is an auto-off feature. You have to plug it in and take the plug out to make it go on and off. Other than that... it's a great addition to our kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Karen G

customer_reviews.title: Grilled Cheese in minutes
customer_reviews.text: Great grilled sandwiches now. I’m still getting used to getting both sides browned. Thicker bread helps.

customer_reviews.title: I can't live without it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older one that died after many years. I am not much of a panini person but I use it to toast bread and cannot imagine being without it. I hate traditional toasters that get the bread very hard and dry, this one keeps it soft but warm, so good.

customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research on panini makers to find one appropriate for my college going son. this was perfect since he can do so many other things besides panini sandwiches. He has also done quesadillas, eggs and some veggies. It heats evenly, cleans extremely well and a great time saver. It easily fits more than one sandwich. This one is a keeper for a long time

customer_reviews.text: This is easy to operate and creates nice, crisp sandwiches. I love the adjustable lid. The lights are very accurate at letting you know when it is heated up and when your sandwiches are done. Really enjoy using it.

product_meta.title: Breville Duo 1500-Watt Nonstick Panini Press
product_meta.description: In keeping with its heritage of creating the world's first domestic version of a professional sandwich press, Breville introduces the Panini Duo . With a 1500 watt heating element that heats up quickly, the Panini Duo's top plate delivers beautiful grill marks on any kind of bread, while its bottom plate delivers even and quicker heat on the flat to make the perfect Panini or your own toasted sandwich creation. Grill surfaces are made with a non stick, scratch proof Quantanium surface for easy cleaning. With its sturdy construction and stainless steel construction, the Panini Duo delivers on Breville's promise of performance and elegance.Care The grill is easier to clean when slightly warm but should always be allowed to cool somewhat before cleaning. Always clean the panini press after each use to prevent build up on baked on foods. Wipe the cooking plates with a soft damp cloth. If the cooked on food is not removed with the damp cloth, reheat the grill for 1 – 2 minutes then brush the food with a little oil. Allow to stand for 5 minutes with the grill turned off, then wipe with a damp cloth. Wipe the outside of the grill with a soft damp cloth and warm soapy water. Do not use abrasive cleaners or harsh scouring pads on either the plates or the outside of the grill. This can scratch and damage the surfaces.
feature_bullets: 1500 watt panini press with nonstick, scratch resistant Quantanium cooking surface
Flat bottom plate for fast, thorough cooking; ribbed top plate creates grill marks
Floating hinge; 4 height settings; on/ready lights; nonslip feet; locking storage clip
Cord wrap; brushed stainless steel housing; user manual with recipes included
Measures 13 by 11 3/4 by 5 1/4 inches; 1 year limited warranty

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
